Song.Title: You Are So Beautiful
Song.Lyrics:
You are so beautiful to me
You are so beautiful to me
Can't you see?
You're everything I hoped for
You're everything I need
You are so beautiful to me

Such joy and happiness
You bring
Such joy and happiness
You bring
Like a dream

A guiding light
That shines in the night
Heaven's gift to me
You are so beautiful to me
